item.title: ND-16 North at I-94 West
item.description: ND-16 North at I-94 West to Billings, Montana.

item.title: ND-16 North at I-94
item.description: ND-16 North at I-94 near Beach. Use I-94 east for Bismarck; I-94 west for Billings (Montana).

item.title: ND-16 North Approaching I-94
item.description: ND-16 North approaching I-94 near Beach.

item.title: N. Central Ave. at ND-16
item.description: N. Central Ave. at ND-16 in Beach. Turn left on ND-16 for I-94 access.

item.title: ND-16 South - Milemarker 75
item.description: Mile marker 75 on ND-16 south in Beach.

item.title: ND-16 North at Junction at 34th St SW
item.description: ND-16 North at 34th St. SW in Beach. Turn left to continue north on ND-16 and for I-94.

item.title: ND-16 South - 1st. Ave. NW and 4th St. NW
item.description: ND-16 south in Beach at intersection of 1st Ave NW and 4th St. NW. Turn left on 4th St. NW to continue south on ND-16.

item.title: ND-16 South - Turn left for Golva
item.description: ND-16 south in Beach at intersection of 1st Ave NW and 4th St. NW. Turn left on ND-16 south (4th St. NW) to Golva.

item.title: ND-16 South - Beach
item.description: Entering Beach on ND-16 south. Beach is the county of Golden Valley County.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 1 Offramp
item.description: I-94 East on Exit 1 Offramp at ND-16 junction.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 1 Offramp
item.description: I-94 East on Exit 1 Offramp. Turn left for ND-16 north to Williston; turn right for ND-16 south to Beach and Golva.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 1 - ND-16/Beach

item.title: I-94 East - Welcome To North Dakota
item.description: Welcome to North Dakota on I-94 east. Taken at the Montana - North Dakota state line.

item.title: End ND-1804 West
item.description: End ND-1804 West at the Montana line.

item.title: End ND-1804 West
item.description: End ND-1804 West at the Montana line.

item.title: ND-1804 East at ND-58
item.description: ND-1804 East at ND-58 in Williams County. Turn right for ND-58 South; left for ND-1804 East.

item.title: ND-1804 East Approaching ND-58
item.description: ND-1804 East approaching ND-58. Use ND-58 south for Fairview (MT) and Sidney (MT). Continue east on ND-1804 for Williston.

item.title: End ND-58 North at ND-1804
item.description: End ND-58 North at ND-1804. Use ND-1804 east for Williston; ND-1804 west for Bainville (MT).

item.title: ND-58 North Approaching ND-1804
item.description: ND-58 north approaching ND-1804 in Williams County.

item.title: ND-58 North - Missouri River
item.description: Crossing the Missouri River on ND-58 North. This bridge is a few miles upstream from the confluence with the Yellowstone River.

item.title: ND-200 East at ND-58 North
item.description: ND-200 East at ND-58 North to Williston. Continue east on ND-200 for Watford City.

item.title: ND-200 East - Welcome To North Dakota
item.description: Welcome to North Dakota on ND-200 East.
